description:
In order to review cucumber reports
  Fred, a cucumber user
  Wants to have cucumber reports in HTML

elements.name: Fred wants to see passing scenarios in the HTML report

steps.name: this feature runs with background
Fred runs a passing cucumber scenario
he has the JSON cucumber formatted file at the end of run
cucumber-html-reporter should create HTML report

elements.name: Fred runs scenario outline for John and print on HTML report

steps.name: this feature runs with background
Fred runs a passing cucumber scenario on behalf of "John"
he has the JSON cucumber formatted file at the end of run
cucumber-html-reporter should create HTML report

elements.name: Fred runs scenario outline for Bob and print on HTML report

steps.name: this feature runs with background
Fred runs a passing cucumber scenario on behalf of "Bob"
he has the JSON cucumber formatted file at the end of run
cucumber-html-reporter should create HTML report

elements.name: Fred wants to print test data in the HTML reports for debugging purpose

steps.name: this feature runs with background
Fred attaches the "test data to be printed" to the Given step of passing cucumber scenario
he has the JSON cucumber formatted file at the end of run
cucumber-html-reporter should create HTML report with test-data

elements.name: Fred wants to use data table and print on HTML report

steps.name: this feature runs with background
Fred runs a passing scenario for the following data set
he has the JSON cucumber formatted file at the end of run
cucumber-html-reporter should create HTML report with data-table

name: Happy HTML reporting

elements.name: Fred wants to see a Screenshot attached to the HTML report

steps.name: Fred runs a failing cucumber scenario
he has the JSON cucumber formatted file at the end of run
a failing scenario captures a screenshot
cucumber-html-reporter should create HTML report with Screenshot

elements.name: Fred wants to see if steps are pending in the HTML report

steps.name: Fred runs a cucumber scenario
he left this step as a pending
cucumber-html-reporter should report pending step with code-snippets in HTML report

elements.name: Fred wants to see if steps are undefined on the HTML report

steps.name: Fred runs a cucumber scenario
he left this step as a undefined
cucumber-html-reporter should create undefined step in HTML report

elements.name: Fred wants to see if steps are skipped on the HTML report

steps.name: Fred runs a cucumber scenario
he throws the pending exception from this step
cucumber-html-reporter should create HTML report with skipped and pending steps
